name: Junkmon
description: Junkmon is a Puppet Digimon. It is a Digimon with a habit of tossing junk parts into the cannon on its back. It creates a comfortable environment by disassembling the surrounding structures. If a factory one is familiar with disappears before they know it, then a large number of Junkmon may be responsible. When it discovers invading enemies, it will drive them away with its "Parabolic Junk". Persistent opponents will suffer its "Scrap Teeth".
